mapper.select: SELECT memo.* FROM memo INNER JOIN memo_tags ON memo.id = memo_tags.memo_id INNER JOIN tags ON tags.id = memo_tags.tags_id WHERE tags.tag = #{tagName} AND tags.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY memo.id DESC
SELECT date( creat_time ) AS daily, count(*) AS 'count' FROM memo WHERE user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY DATE( creat_time ) LIMIT 60;
